function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in greenwashing leading to consumer skepticism about brand promises to preserve the environment","Impact":"Negative impact on consumer attitude towards the brand and trust in the whole green market","Mitigation":"Implementing transparent and verifiable eco-friendly practices, educating consumers about genuine sustainability efforts","Technologies":"Blockchain for supply chain transparency, IoT sensors for environmental monitoring","People":"Consumers, environmental advocates","Owner":"Companies, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Mistrust leading to decreased engagement in the long run","Impact":"Decreased consumer engagement and participation","Mitigation":"Building and maintaining trust through consistent ethical practices and transparent communication","Technologies":"Customer relationship management (CRM) systems, social media monitoring tools","People":"Consumers, brand managers","Owner":"Companies, marketing departments"},{"Description":"Asymmetry of information in the marketplace","Impact":"Difficulty for consumers to evaluate product quality and make informed decisions","Mitigation":"Providing credible and transparent information about product quality and sustainability efforts","Technologies":"Product certification systems, data analytics for consumer insights","People":"Consumers, regulatory bodies","Owner":"Companies, industry standards organizations"}]}
